actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
  subquery.customer_year, 
  AVG(subquery.renewal_rate) AS average_renewal_rate
FROM (
  SELECT 
    YEAR(c.date_created) AS customer_year, 
    100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT case when o.status in ('complete', 'edd_subscription') 
      AND YEAR(o.date_created) = YEAR(c.date_created) + 1 then o.customer_id end) / COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) AS renewal_rate
  FROM 
    wp_edd_customers c
    LEFT JOIN wp_edd_orders o ON c.id = o.customer_id
  WHERE 
    YEAR(c.date_created) >= 2015
		AND YEAR(c.date_created) <= 2021
    AND (c.purchase_count >= 1 OR (c.purchase_count = 1 AND c.purchase_value < 847))
  GROUP BY 
    YEAR(c.date_created)
) subquery
GROUP BY 
  subquery.customer_year;
